Find your future with us.The Boeing Defense, Space & Security (BDS) team is seeking a Senior Structures Design Engineer located in El Segundo, CA. This includes solving issues along the value stream while in production through spacecraft integration and test.  Competencies needed for this role include Adaptability, Collaboration, Communication,
